name: chirpy
description: Chirpy is a federated microblogging platform built on ActivityPub, focused on privacy and simplicity. It lets users create posts, follow others, and federate with Mastodon and other compatible social networks.
features: Federated Microblogging: Connect with Mastodon and fediverse. Decentralized social.
ActivityPub: Built on open protocol for interoperability. Standard compliance.
Privacy-Focused: Self-hosted for complete data control. Your posts, your server.
Simple Interface: Clean, focused microblogging experience. No distractions.
Follow & Share: Connect with users across the fediverse. Social networking.
Self-Hosted: Run your own social media instance. Complete independence.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements. Efficient operation.
